page.title: 15A TYPICAL SATURDAY FOR ME
page.content: It is 8.3Oa.m. on Saturday and I am watching the'Saturday Picture'show on B.B.C. television.At around 1O.3Oa.m. I get dressed,go downstairs and make breakfast.Now it is 11.3Oa.m. and after tidying my bedroom mum and I go to London to the Roman Road market or to Crisp Street market.We wander among the stalls and do some shopping,seeing what bargains are available.At about 3p.m. we return home to watch television.At 5.3O.p.m.my dad comes and picks me up to go to his house in Peckham.There I have a friend called Nicola and we usually go to the park for a while.Tea is around 7.3Op.m. after which I watch more television or play records.Supper is at 1Op.m.when I have peanut butter toast and then I go to bed and read.
